channel.title: Node Js Discord Bot - On Command Can Bot Create A Key
channel.description: hello i am making a node.js discord bot auth, and before i buy the seller upgrade i was wondering if it is possible to make it so when someone does a certain command like !getkey then it creates a 1 day temp key and the key adds to the licenses section

item.title: Node Js Discord Bot - On Command Can Bot Create A Key
item.dc:creator: Globe
item.source: Node Js Discord Bot - On Command Can Bot Create A Key

item.title: Node Js Discord Bot - On Command Can Bot Create A Key
item.dc:creator: mazkdevf
item.description:
client.on('messageCreate', async message => {
    if (message.author.bot) return;
    var prefix = "!";
    if (!message.content.startsWith(prefix)) return;

    const args = message.content.slice(prefix.length).trim().split(/ +/);
    const commandName = args.shift().toLowerCase();

    if (commandName === "getkey") {
        fetch('https://keyauth.win/api/seller/?sellerkey=sellerkeyhere&type=add&expiry=1&mask=XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX&level=1&amount=1&format=json').then(res => res.json()).then(json => {
            message.author.send({
                content: `Here is your key: ${json.key}`
            })
        })
    }
});

Also if you need anything else, I have a marketplace offer on KeyAuth Discord for anything special order or smth
Invite to Server: discord.gg/keyauth
Channel: Discord

Read full topic
